title: SVG Compressor
description: Compress SVG files online for free, can compress about 50% of the volume, support custom parameters, visual compression, support one-click copy/download/delete results
drag: Drag and drop SVG files here or click to upload
paste_not_svg: Paste text does not contain SVG information

introduction.totalFree: This tool is totally free, no registration required, and helps every designer and developer.
introduction.noSizeLimit: Supports any size of SVG files, no need to worry about upload or processing limits.
introduction.safeAndSecure: All compression operations are completed in the local browser, and no user files are saved on the server, ensuring your privacy and data security.
introduction.fastProcessing: Using efficient algorithms, SVG compression is completed instantly, without waiting.
introduction.highQualityCompression: Ensures a high compression ratio while preserving the quality of the SVG image to the greatest extent.
introduction.flexibleConfiguration: Provides a rich set of compression parameters to meet different scenarios and needs, and customize the compression effect as needed.

guide_steps: Add SVG files: Drag & drop, select files, or paste SVG code directly.
Real-time optimization: Uploaded SVGs are optimized instantly. Fine-tune settings in the right-hand panel for immediate results.
Preview & compare: See the optimized SVG, check the size reduction, and compression ratio.
Get the result: Copy the optimized SVG code (raw, Base64, or URL-encoded) or download the file directly.
